attributes.action: bring back metal mickey to be transmitted at the same time as neighbours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we feel that at teatime u can only watch stuff like deal or no deal and the only reason a lot of people watch is paul o grady just 2 c if he has a heart attack on live tv.metal mickey was shown at t time on a sat evening it shaped my weekend

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
